import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Form, Button, Col, Container, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import axios from '../../axios-orders'; function SelectionFrom({route, value, onChangeName}) { const bookingData = useState({ name: 'jimmu de', numOfKayaks: 'you did not pick any', timeOfDay: 'you did not select any', routePicked: route, date: value, }); const postDataHandler = () => { const booking = { name: 'testing', numOfKayaks: bookingData[0].numOfKayaks } // const bookingssd = { // routePicked: bookingData[0].routePicked, // name: bookingData[0].name, // numOfKayaks: bookingData[0].numOfKayaks, // date: bookingData[0].date, // time: bookingData[0].timeOfDay, // } axios.post('/bookings.json', booking) .then(response => console.log(response)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return (

{route} on {value.format("DD")} of {value.format("MMMM")}

 Name Number of Kayaks bookingData[1]({numOfKayaks: e.target.value})}> Start Time bookingData[1]({timeOfDay: e.target.value})} /> {/* */}
) } export default SelectionFrom;
